title: Bin Buddy Fresh Pink Grapefruit & Spring Blossom 450g, Pack of 2 - Bin Freshener Deodoriser Powder, Leaves Your Bin Smelling Great - Suitable for Indoor and Outdoor Bins
features: KEEP BINS FRESH AND CLEAN — stop and smell the roses, not the contents of your bin! Bin Buddy Fresh Pink Grapefruit and Spring Blossom (Pack of 2) bin deodoriser can help remove those nasty smells from your bin, leaving a pleasant fragrance behind

SOAK UP THE MESS — Bin Buddy powder helps to soak up the mess by absorbing the runny liquids and smelly condensation that gathers at the bottom of your wheelie bins and bin bags for up to 42 applications per tub!
CONTAINS AN ODOUR ELIMINATOR — don't just mask smells, eliminate them; our bin freshener removes the nasty smells in your bins and leaves our refreshing citrus or floral fragrance in its wake

LEAVES BINS SMELLING GREAT — Bin Buddy keeps bins fresh and clean for days - when used as required, it helps reduce the frequency of use of bin bags and the number of trips to the curb to dispatch your rubbish

IDEAL FOR INDOOR AND OUTDOOR BINS — Bin Buddy Pink Grapefruit and Spring Blossom deodorising powder can be used in indoor and outdoor bins; simply shake some powder into the bin every time you use it to keep it smelling great and get the most out of your bin bags!
description: Product Description It’s time to add some ZING in your life! Bin Buddy Pink Grapefruit 450g Powder and Bin Buddy Spring Blossom (Pack of 2) will transport you and your bin to a new level of clean! Perfectly capturing the freshness of citrus grapefruit and beautiful blossom flowers, your bin never needs to smell of leftovers again. Shake regularly into your bins and bin bags to control bad smells, soak up excess liquids and release those citrus and floral vibes for up to 42 applications per pack. Bin Buddy powder helps to soak up the mess by absorbing the runny liquids and smelly condensation that gathers at the bottom of the bin and bin bags that can keep them smelling for days on end, so you can get the best value out of your bin bags! For ultimate bin freshness, why not try Bin Buddy Spray. Our sprays come in a wide variety of smells so you can choose your favourite and help your bins last longer AND be safer! Suitable for indoor and outdoor bins and bin bags. Have you tried our new squeeze, Bin Buddy Pink Grapefruit powder? We are not going to go all sour on you if you haven’t, but it isn't just us who are saying it’s the zest! Ingredients Spring Blossom = <5% perfumes, alpha-hexylcinnamalde-hyde, 3.7-Dimethylocta-1.6-dien-3-ol, benzyl-2-hydroxybenzoate Pink grapefruit = G - Benzyl benzoate, d-Limonene, Linalool, <5% non-ionic surfactants, <5 perfumes
